experience.title: Sales Associate
responsibilities: Engaged with customers to identify their needs and provide expert product recommendations, contributing to a 10% increase in store loyalty program sign-ups.
Processed high volumes of transactions using POS systems accurately and efficiently during peak hours.
Maintained department visual standards by organizing displays and restocking inventory regularly.

experience.title: Retail Intern
responsibilities: Shadowed store management to learn inventory control and supply chain logistics within a high-traffic retail environment.
Assisted in seasonal floor resets and promotional signage installation to drive department sales.
Provided front-end support including customer inquiries and handling returns/exchanges.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
